Package controller

Class Utility

java.lang.Object
controller.Utility
public class Utility extends Object
Utility class to store methods, variables... This will be useful to store all methods and variables for future expansion of the project

    static void
    checkMaxMin(javafx.scene.control.TextField maxF, javafx.scene.control.TextField minF, int stockInt)
    Validation to make sure the Maximum value is always greater than the Minimum value and vise versa Throws error that Min is too large if Min is larger than both Max and Stock fields If Min is larger than stock and Max is smaller than stock, will throw an error and ask if perhaps the values were accidentally switched Otherwise, left remaining else if to catch any other instances where the Max is greater than Min or vise versa
    static void
    checkPos(double d)
    Methods to validate various input types, makes sure all numbers are positive with double type

    checkPos(int i)

    • checkIntEmpty

      public static void checkIntEmpty(javafx.scene.control.TextField f, Utility.inventoryLevel IL)
      Validates the Stock, Min, and Max fields. If empty, will prompt to set the field to the default value instead

    • checkMaxMin

      public static void checkMaxMin(javafx.scene.control.TextField maxF, javafx.scene.control.TextField minF, int stockInt)
      Validation to make sure the Maximum value is always greater than the Minimum value and vise versa Throws error that Min is too large if Min is larger than both Max and Stock fields If Min is larger than stock and Max is smaller than stock, will throw an error and ask if perhaps the values were accidentally switched Otherwise, left remaining else if to catch any other instances where the Max is greater than Min or vise versa

    • checkStock

      public static void checkStock(javafx.scene.control.TextField stock, int min, int max)
      Validation to make sure the stock value is between the min and max, should not be run before checking the Max and Min values

    • checkProductPrice

      static void checkProductPrice(double price, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> associatedPartTable, javafx.scene.control.TextField prodPriceField)
      Validation to make sure the product cost is not less than the sum cost of associated parts

    • checkAssociatedParts

      static void checkAssociatedParts(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> associatedPartTable)
      Validation to make sure a product has an associated part. To be run when creating or modifying a product.

    • searchPart

      public static void searchPart(javafx.scene.control.TextField partSearchField, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTable)
      Validates the search field, runs the search function, sets the table to match the search results or returns the original parts table if no results are found or if the search field is empty
